definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: This is ionic radii with a noble gas configuration.
sentences.chinese: 這是稀有氣體的離子半徑。

sentences.english: The last column are rare gas, stable chemical properties.
sentences.chinese: 最後一列上都是稀有氣體，化學性質穩定。

sentences.english: Helium is the lightest rare gas .
The six noble gases are found in the far right column of the periodic table.
sentences.chinese: 六種稀有氣體在元素週期表的最右側。

sentences.english: The others are noble gases such as Argon.
sentences.chinese: 另外就是一些稀有氣體比如氬。
